__e: You've made it this far, and you'll keep going ... until they find a cure.
It's like you said... we have to hold on for the cure.
She says we have a roof over our heads so we should sit it out till she has time for us again and she'll make up for it.
We want to get to the morning obviously, see what's left and then we'll push on, push on from there.
We have to hold on. Stay alive, for them.
I asked them to hold out as long as they could. And they did.
